title: event hub/pub-sub/messenger implementation in UWP
body: We often have a requirement that we need to publish/send messages from one ViewModel and another ViewModel needs to subscribe or receive these messages so they can communicate with each other. I don't find any default implementation in windows community toolkit. Of course, we can create events to pub/sub but I think a common messenger system would be more helpful. I have created a simple implementation for this scenario. Any interests?
